about_the_game: AI Solitaire - Thin and Fit provides 3 new decks to use with AI Solitaire! This DLC is themed around beautiful girls with lean bodies. If you prefer your women with a more natural style, this is the DLC for you!

content_descriptors.notes:
The first time you run AI Solitaire you will be directed to the Parental Controls menu. There you can set the allowable content level that will be seen in the game. You may protect these settings with a password, or you can permanently change them so that they can only be changed by uninstalling and reinstalling the game.

AI Solitaire is intended to be a celebration of AI Generated Art. The content of this DLC includes beautiful women rendered in a variety of artistic styles. The outfits and costumes can be revealing. Various art styles may feature exagerated proportions. Swimsuits and sexy clothing will always have a minimum of a Teen+ rating. Overly exagerated female proportions or wearing lingerie will be rated Adult.

detailed_description: AI Solitaire - Thin and Fit provides 3 new decks to use with AI Solitaire! This DLC is themed around beautiful girls with lean bodies. If you prefer your women with a more natural style, this is the DLC for you!
legal_notice:
AI Solitaire - Thin and Fit is © Copyright 2025 by Denki Gaka. All Rights Reserved.
Please Note: The art for the card decks was created using Stable Diffusion, an artificial intelligence text to image generator. The main purpose in creating this product was to test the limits of what is possible using this amazing new technology. We claim copyright in the card deck images as they are presented here, but acknowledge that the artwork is not an original work made by us, but rather is the results of years of hard work by talented computer scientists, as well as decades, if not centuries, of artistic endeavor by the truly talented artists whose work was used to train the models. Acknowledgement and our thanks goes out to both groups.
